phrs.translation: 日历控件, 最酷, 无礼的, 最凉快
跳舞赚钱, 最酷的舞蹈皇后小游戏
我认识的最酷的女孩, 我也清楚你是最酷的女孩丨春小风

sentences.sentence: Many of the coolest gadgets this year are the same as the coolest gadgets last year—or the year before, even.
sentences.translation: 今年许多最酷的小玩意和去年的一样，甚至和前年的一样。

sentences.sentence: Many of the coolest gadgets this year are the same as the coolest gadgets last year — or the year before, even.

sentences.sentence: This must be the coolest book in the world!
sentences.translation: 这一定是世界上最酷的书了！
